title: Are there any people in Garnada, Spain who consider Muslims as their ancestors? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are people all over Spain who won’t deny they have at least one Muslim ancestor. Actually, practically all will recognize that either at first or as an afterthought. Considering the number of anyone’s ancestors gets exponentially huge with each generation as you go back in anyones genealogy tree and the fact Muslims were living in the Iberian peninsula for quite a long time, it would rather be really difficult (rather, practically impossible) for anyone to totally lack Muslim ancestors and have zero Muslim ancestors. But that’s it. People don’t go around giving it much importance.
